title: Africa: the land and its people. No. 4
brief_description: Magazine items: Study of Cape Town, seaport and commercial centre of the Union of South Africa. Discusses and illustrates influence of the Dutch on the life and art of the Cape; shows coastal landmarks and suburbs, Table Mountain, the Twelve Apostles; concludes with scenes from a ballet produced by the Corps de Ballet of the University of Cape Town.
